text: Please talk to meHi all So  things have been tough lately  I ll try to write this coherently but I m struggling   I ve been going through a time time lately for lots of reasons  My long standing anxiety  depression OCD  recent problems with my university  relationship problems conflictions  not a word  apparently  and so on   I ve spend the last few days not really doing much  I ve been trying to tidy up my tip of my a room  but haven t gotten far  Other than that  I ve mainly been in bed  drinking and watching YouTube  and doing other simple things tbsg don t tax me much   So yeah  I m going through a tough time  one that s involved a lot more alcohol than ever before in my life   It s just before  am my time  and my sleeping pattern is messed up  It usually is anyway  but it s been especially so lately   My mind is a mess  I m struggling a lot  I have some people to talk to but  I don t know  Please talk to me  I feel alone I m supposed to be visiting my parents later today  Sunday  for dinner and a visit  I enjoy doing that but the anxiety of leaving my house and having to do things can be a bit much sometimes  especially with my sleeping problems  so it s been at least a couple weeks or so since I last visited them   I know my mum misses me and has been worried about me   I see the sheer number of threads started in this subreddit of people truly struggling  and it s depressing  I try to help when I can   I just need  something  I don t know what   I don t know if I ll fall asleep and go to my parents later in the day  I hope to visit them   I might go there drunk or somewhat drunk at the time  I don t want to worry them  But it helps me  It makes me feel better  Makes me forget things and the bad thoughts don t last as long  And it helps me sleep   Chris

text: I am an idiot I was walking to first bell Band and there was this girl walking in front of me to the general direction of the band room   I didn t recognize her   I m thinking to myself   Maybe she s going to the office or she s a freshman band member   We keep walking in silence until we reach the room   She was right behind me  so I hold the door for her and she says  Thank you   You re welcome   I thought her voice sounded familiar  but so didn t get a good look at her face  especially with the masks   When I walk in  I walk to my seat at the other side of the room  and she s standing by the wall near the doorway   Then she left the room   I racked my brain when we weren t playing trying to remember so she was because she seemed familiar   After class we walk to next period and I see her again and I get a good glimpse of her face and I knew who she was immediately Any takers   It was the girl who I ve had a bit of crush on since eighth grade  I m a sophomore   She dyed her hair and sometimes people can look totally different I m still a little disappointed in myself because of this lol
summary: The girl who I've had a crush on since eighth grade has dyed her hair and I didn't recognize her. I'm disappointed in myself because of this.    She was the girl I've loved since 8th grade.
cleaned: girl crush eighth grade dye hair not recognize disappoint girl love grade

text: My life is a rollercoaster of emotions and I m tired of it I woke up feeling great for no real reason and now all I want to do is blow my brains out  I couldn t care less about living  I put my mask on  head out for the day  come back and cry  It s a viscous cycle I m stuck in and I m starting to work up courage to finally get it over with  No one is left to care  All I do is come here  vent out my emotions and thoughts  consider death then go to bed to start my cycle again  It s all I think about anymore  if I get fired  fail my classes  I couldn t care less  Soon I tell myself  And I believe that
summary: My life is a rollercoaster of emotions and I'm tired of it. I'm starting to work up courage to finally get it over with. I don't care if I get fired or fail my classes, I couldn't care less.
cleaned: life rollercoaster emotion tired start work courage finally not care fire fail class not care

text: Nothing ever goes good for me and I m pretty fucking tired of dealing with this shitSeriously  it feels like I m cursed and I ll never be able to be happy  My life has been fucked up ever since I was a kid and now no matter what I fucking do  everything just comes crashing down again  It seems so easy for everyone else to fix their life and get their shit together but whenever I try to do something productive  something ALWAYS has to go wrong and it just fucking ruins the small amount of motivation that I had   I try saving up to get myself a car and I finally get one  but of course it has transmission issues that started happening only a week after I got it  I try getting an actual job so I don t have to be a leech and burden on my family anymore  then the coronavirus hits and nobody is hiring around me  I try meeting new people and they just ghost me after a few conversations  I try exercising but I have asthma so I can t do shit without having an asthma attack   I m just so fucking TIRED of always losing and I feel like I m starting to lose my mind  God fucking damn it bro  Why do I have to go through all this shit for  Why do I gotta keep trying only for things to come crashing down back to square one all over again  I ve been depressed for so long now and I have been trying with everything I have to get better  but nothing is changing   I m so tired of the constant failure  depression  anxiety  low self esteem  etc  The only escape I have from all of this shit at this point is death  I m at the top floor of a hotel room now and I could easily open the window and jump out and all of this pain would stop forever  I just wanted to get this all off my chest before I make this decision here  I just want the pain to stop  that s all
summary: Everything always goes wrong for him. He's depressed and he's at a hotel room. He wants to jump out of the window to escape the pain. He feels like he's cursed and he'll never be able to be happy.
cleaned: go wrong depressed hotel room want jump window escape pain feel like curse able happy
